content.value:
I'm starting to see incidents as essential for knowledge sharing. If you're not experiencing any, it then makes sense to periodically introduce controlled incidents to learn about your infrastructure and how it behaves. 

Note: Hardly an original thought/realisation.
content.html: I'm starting to see incidents as essential for knowledge sharing. If you're not experiencing any, it then makes sense to periodically introduce controlled incidents to learn about your infrastructure and how it behaves. Note: Hardly an original thought/realisation.
